Spawn processing update messages

Source: R/process_message.R
process_message.Rd

helper function to provide processing messages

process_message(mess_text, gui, mess_lab, verbose = TRUE)

Arguments

mess_text

character text to be shown in the processing windows and/or the console
gui

logical indicating if the message should be passed to the status window or only to the console.
mess_lab

pointer to the gwindow used to shoe messages when gui == TRUE
verbose

logical If FALSE, suppress processing messages, Default: TRUE

Value

The function is called for its side effects

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
